description.zh-cn: 中国明清时期管理皇家宗室事务的机构。掌管皇帝九族的宗族名册，记录宗室成员的各项信息，并处理其请求、奖惩等事宜。
description.en: An institution in Ming and Qing dynasty China that managed the affairs of the imperial clan. It was responsible for maintaining the genealogical records of the emperor's nine degrees of kinship, recording information about clan members, and handling their requests, rewards, and punishments.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，由朱元璋建立。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history, established by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 明朝初期设立的皇家宗室事务管理机构，为宗人府的前身。
description.en: The institution for managing imperial clan affairs established in the early Ming Dynasty, the predecessor of the Zongrenfu.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代官署，为六部之一，掌管典礼、祭祀、学校、科举和外交等事务。
description.en: An ancient Chinese government office, one of the Six Ministries, in charge of ceremonies, sacrifices, schools, imperial examinations, and foreign affairs.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋次子，明朝第一任宗人府宗人令。
description.en: The second son of Emperor Hongwu of the Ming Dynasty, the first Zongren Ling of the Zongrenfu in the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋三子，明朝宗人府左宗正。
description.en: The third son of Emperor Hongwu of the Ming Dynasty, Left Zongzheng of the Zongrenfu.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第三位皇帝，明太祖朱元璋四子，曾任宗人府右宗正。
description.en: The third emperor of the Ming dynasty, the fourth son of Emperor Hongwu, who once served as the Right Zongzheng of the Zongrenfu.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋五子，明朝宗人府左宗人。
description.en: The fifth son of Emperor Hongwu of the Ming Dynasty, Left Zongren of the Zongrenfu.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋六子，明朝宗人府右宗人。
description.en: The sixth son of Emperor Hongwu of the Ming Dynasty, Right Zongren of the Zongrenfu.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个大一统封建王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第四位皇帝，清朝统一中国后的第二位皇帝。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Qing dynasty, and the second Qing emperor to rule over China proper.

description.zh-cn: 清朝初期宗人府等衙门设置的官职，负责满汉文翻译及沟通，后被裁撤。
description.en: An official position in agencies such as the Zongrenfu during the early Qing Dynasty, responsible for Manchu-Chinese translation and communication, later abolished.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第五位皇帝，清朝统一中国后的第三位皇帝。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Qing dynasty, and the third Qing emperor to rule over China proper.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代官职，于清朝雍正二年，宗人府的郎中改称为理事官。
description.en: An ancient Chinese official title. In the second year of the Yongzheng reign of the Qing dynasty, the Langzhong of the Zongrenfu was renamed Lisiguan (Director).

description.zh-cn: 中国古代官职，于清朝雍正二年，宗人府的员外郎改称为副理事官。
description.en: An ancient Chinese official title. In the second year of the Yongzheng reign of the Qing dynasty, the Yuanwailang of the Zongrenfu was renamed Fulisiguan (Deputy Director).

description.zh-cn: 清朝官员，曾任宗人府府丞。其奏请使得理事官、副理事官等职专用宗室人员。
description.en: An official of the Qing Dynasty who served as Fucheng (Vice Minister) of the Zongrenfu. His proposal led to the positions of Lisiguan and Fulisiguan being exclusively held by members of the imperial clan.

description.zh-cn: 越南历史上的一个朝代。
description.en: A dynasty in Vietnamese history.

description.zh-cn: 越南陈朝末年仿照中国明朝设立的宗室管理机构，后改名大宗正府。
description.en: An institution for managing the imperial clan established in Vietnam at the end of the Trần dynasty, modeled after the Ming dynasty in China. It was later renamed the Grand Clan Court.

description.zh-cn: 由越南宗正府改名而来，后在后黎朝时期改名为宗人府。
description.en: Renamed from the Vietnamese Zongzhengfu, it was later renamed Zongrenfu during the Later Lê dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 越南历史上最长的朝代。
description.en: The longest-ruling dynasty in Vietnamese history.

description.zh-cn: 越南后黎朝及阮朝初期的宗室管理机构，由大宗正府改名而来，后改名为尊人府。
description.en: The imperial clan affairs agency during the Later Lê and early Nguyễn dynasties in Vietnam, renamed from the Grand Clan Court, and later renamed Tôn Nhơn Phủ.

description.zh-cn: 越南历史上最后一个君主制王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南阮朝第三位皇帝。因其名讳，越南的宗人府改名为尊人府。
description.en: The third emperor of the Nguyễn dynasty of Vietnam. Due to the taboo on his personal name, the Vietnamese Zongrenfu was renamed Tôn Nhơn Phủ.

description.zh-cn: 越南阮朝的宗室管理机构，由宗人府为避绍治帝名讳而改名。
description.en: The imperial clan affairs agency of the Nguyễn dynasty in Vietnam, renamed from Zongrenfu to avoid the naming taboo of Emperor Thiệu Trị.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西殖民帝国在东南亚的殖民地，1897年后将越南尊人府纳入其直接管理。
description.en: A colony of the French colonial empire in Southeast Asia. After 1897, it brought the Vietnamese Tôn Nhơn Phủ under its direct administration.

description.zh-cn: 法属印度支那联邦在中圻（越南中部）的统治机构，直接管理尊人府。
description.en: The ruling body of French Indochina in Annam (central Vietnam), which directly administered the Tôn Nhơn Phủ.

description.zh-cn: 明朝于洪武三年（1370年）设立大宗正院，作为管理皇家宗室事务的机构。
description.en: In 1370 (the third year of the Hongwu reign), the Ming dynasty established the Dazongzhengyuan as the institution for managing the affairs of the imperial clan.

description.zh-cn: 明朝洪武二十二年（1389年），大宗正院改名为宗人府。
description.en: In 1389 (the twenty-second year of the Hongwu reign), the Dazongzhengyuan was renamed the Zongrenfu.

description.zh-cn: 明朝后期，宗人府归于礼部管理，其所管辖的事都移交给礼部。
description.en: In the later period of the Ming Dynasty, the Zongrenfu was placed under the administration of the Ministry of Rites, and all its affairs were transferred to the Ministry of Rites.

description.zh-cn: 明朝初期，秦王朱樉担任宗人府的宗人令。
description.en: In the early Ming Dynasty, Zhu Shuang, Prince of Qin, served as the Zongren Ling of the Zongrenfu.

position.en: Left Zongzheng (Grand marshal of the Left)

description.zh-cn: 明朝初期，晋王朱㭎担任宗人府的左宗正。
description.en: In the early Ming Dynasty, Zhu Gang, Prince of Jin, served as the Left Zongzheng of the Zongrenfu.

position.en: Right Zongzheng (Grand marshal of the Right)

description.zh-cn: 明朝初期，燕王朱棣担任宗人府的右宗正。
description.en: In the early Ming Dynasty, Zhu Di, Prince of Yan, served as the Right Zongzheng of the Zongrenfu.

description.zh-cn: 明朝初期，周王朱橚担任宗人府的左宗人。
description.en: In the early Ming Dynasty, Zhu Su, Prince of Zhou, served as the Left Zongren of the Zongrenfu.

description.zh-cn: 明朝初期，楚王朱桢担任宗人府的右宗人。
description.en: In the early Ming Dynasty, Zhu Zhen, Prince of Chu, served as the Right Zongren of the Zongrenfu.

description.zh-cn: 清朝沿设明制，于顺治九年（1652年）设立宗人府。
description.en: The Qing dynasty followed the Ming system and established the Zongrenfu in 1652 (the ninth year of the Shunzhi reign).

description.zh-cn: 康熙十二年（1673年），康熙帝下令裁撤宗人府内的启心郎一职。
description.en: In 1673 (the twelfth year of the Kangxi reign), the Kangxi Emperor ordered the abolition of the Qixinlang position within the Zongrenfu.

description.zh-cn: 雍正二年（1724年），宗人府的郎中改称为理事官。
description.en: In 1724 (the second year of the Yongzheng reign), the title of Langzhong in the Zongrenfu was changed to Lisiguan (Director).

description.zh-cn: 雍正二年（1724年），宗人府的员外郎改称为副理事官。
description.en: In 1724 (the second year of the Yongzheng reign), the title of Yuanwailang in the Zongrenfu was changed to Fulisiguan (Deputy Director).

description.zh-cn: 乾隆二十九年（1764年），宗人府府丞储麟趾上奏，经批准后，理事官、副理事官等职位开始专用宗室人员。
description.en: In 1764 (the twenty-ninth year of the Qianlong reign), Chu Linzhi, the Fucheng of the Zongrenfu, submitted a memorial, and after approval, the positions of Lisiguan and Fulisiguan began to be exclusively held by members of the imperial clan.

description.zh-cn: 越南陈朝末年仿照中国明朝的制度设立了宗正府。
description.en: At the end of the Trần dynasty, Vietnam established the Zongzhengfu, modeling it after the system of the Ming dynasty in China.

description.zh-cn: 越南陈朝末年设立了宗正府。
description.en: Vietnam's Trần dynasty established the Zongzhengfu at the end of its reign.

description.zh-cn: 越南的宗正府后改名为大宗正府。
description.en: The Vietnamese Zongzhengfu was later renamed the Dazongzhengfu (Grand Clan Court).

description.zh-cn: 后黎朝时期，大宗正府改名为宗人府。
description.en: During the Later Lê dynasty, the Dazongzhengfu was renamed Zongrenfu (越南).

description.zh-cn: 阮朝初期，仍然沿设宗人府。
description.en: In the early Nguyễn dynasty, the Zongrenfu (越南) was continued.

description.zh-cn: 1841年（绍治元年），为避绍治帝阮福绵宗名讳，宗人府改名为尊人府。
description.en: In 1841 (the first year of the Thiệu Trị reign), to avoid the naming taboo of Emperor Thiệu Trị (Nguyễn Phúc Miên Tông), the Zongrenfu (Vietnam) was renamed Tôn Nhơn Phủ.

description.zh-cn: 1897年（成泰九年），尊人府不再归阮朝朝廷管理，而被划入法属印度支那联邦的中圻钦使座直接管理。
description.en: In 1897 (the ninth year of the Thành Thái reign), the Tôn Nhơn Phủ was no longer under the administration of the Nguyễn court but was placed under the direct control of the Résident Supérieur d'Annam of French Indochina.

description.zh-cn: 中圻钦使座是法属印度支那联邦在越南中部的统治机构。
description.en: The Résident Supérieur d'Annam was the ruling body of French Indochina in central Vietnam (Annam).
